p:
LOD and LOQs determinations were based on the standard deviation of the response and the slope, following Eqs. 1 and 2. In regard with the honeybees’ analytical method validation, the only differentiation was the LOQ definition that was defined as the lowest fortification level with acceptable precision and accuracy.
1
